Title: Bosch 06112A4060 GBH 2-26 F Professional SDS Plus Rotary Hammer 830W 110V BSH6112A4060
Description:
Bosch GBH 2-26 F Professional SDS Plus Rotary Hammer 110V Version.

The Bosch GBH 2-26 F Professional SDS Plus Rotary Hammer is suitable for a wide range of applications: drilling, hammer drilling and chiselling. It has a reliable and robust design with a long lifetime due to high-quality components. With an improved performance for a fast drilling rate and high chiselling removal rate. Supplied with a quick-change chuck for fast changes between drilling with impact in concrete and drilling without impact in wood and metal.

The rotating brush plate provides equal power in forward and reverse rotation, meaning you can dislodge jammed drill bits. Continuously variable speed control allows for clean drilling starts and there is a locking button for continuous and fatigue-free work. There is also an overload clutch to protect the user and the machine and a ball grommet for preventing cable breaks.

Supplied with: 1 x Quick Change Chuck 13mm, 1 x SDS Plus Quick-change Chuck, 1 x Auxiliary Handle, 1 x Depth Stop 210mm, 1 x Machine Cloth and 1 x Carrying Case.

Specifications:

Input Power: 830W.
No Load Speed: 0-900/min.
Impact Rate: 0–4,000/bpm.
Impact Energy: 2.7 Joules.
Drilling Diameter: Concrete, Hammer Drill Bits 4-26mm, Concrete with Core Cutters 16-68mm, Metal 13mm, Wood 30mm.
Weight: 2.9kg.
